snippet: A senior Taliban commander blamed Malala Yousafzai, the Pakistani schoolgirl shot in the head by the militant group, for provoking the attack by “smearing” the Islamists, according to a copy of a letter he wrote to her.
abstract: A senior Taliban commander blamed Malala Yousafzai, the Pakistani schoolgirl shot in the head by the militant group, for provoking the attack by “smearing” the Islamists, according to a copy of a letter he wrote to her.

headline.main: A Taliban Commander Writes to Malala Yousafzai
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Taliban Commander Writes to Malala Yousafzai
